casebody.data:
In the Matter of L.E.B. and K.T.B. No. 218P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Julia Talbutt, Staff Attorney, for New Hanover County DSS. Regina Floyd-Davis, Attorney Advocate, for Guardian Ad Litem. Michelle F. Lynch, for Mother.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of May 2005 by Guardian Ad Litem for Leave to File Response to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
